title: Ghost Windows 8.1 Luxury (2014) x86 by Khatmau_sr Activated
description:
Ghost Windows 8.1 Luxury (2014) x86 by Khatmau_sr Activated
-----------------------------------------------------------

This torrent contains both WITH and WITHOUT PREINSTALLED SOFTWARE .gho files.

INFO, PICS, VIDS:

NOTE: This is a Ghost .gho backup image, NOT AN INSTALLATION DVD. Burn only GHOST BOOTCD, KEEP .GHO file on any other partition than C drive. This will format the C: partition and it will restore the preinstalled Windows 8.1 Luxury from the .gho image file.


How to install:
1) Burn "Ghost BootCD.iso".
2) Don't forget to save any important files from the C: drive, as it will be formatted.
3) Boot from the burned CD.
4) Select "Local -> Partition -> From image"
5) Select the .gho file from the location you stored it.
6) Select the HDD and the PARTITION where you want to restore the .gho image and install Windows. (DO THIS VERY CAREFUL NOT TO SELECT INCORRECT PARTITION AS THIS WILL PERMANENTLY FORMAT THAT PARTITION)
7) Wait for the process to finish and reboot.
8) Wait for the installation to finish.
9) Enjoy this fine masterpiece made by Khatmau_sr

CREDITS GOES TO KHATMAU_SR, I ONLY UPLOADED THE IMAGES HE UPLOADED ON VIETNAM SLOW SERVERS. IT IS A GREAT OS RELEASE AND I REALLY LIKE IT. CONGRATULATIONS AND THANKS FOR THIS AMAZING WINDOWS 8.1 LUXURY VERSION !!!
